ti:edition.ti:label: De Vita Iulii Agricolae
ti:edition.ti:description: Opera Minora. Tacitus, Cornelius; Furneaux, Henry, editor. Oxford, Clarendon Press. 1900.

ti:translation.ti:label: The Life of Cnaeus Julius Agricola
ti:translation.ti:description: The Agricola and Germany of Tacitus. Tacitus, Cornelius; Church, Alfred John and Brodribb, William Jackson, translators. London, MacMillan and Co. 1868. (Modern Library reprint 1942).

ti:translation.ti:label: Agricola (abridged)
ti:translation.ti:description: The Lives of the Roman Emperors and Their Associates in Five Volumes. Vol. II. Reed, J. Eugene, editor; Murphy, Arthur, translator. Philadelphia, Gebbie and Co. 1883.
